title: Guacamole with Ranchitas Naturales
instructions: Step 1. Cut the avocados in half, remove the pit, and mash the flesh with a spoon or fork until it forms a pur√©e. Place in a bowl.
Step 2. Add the onion, cilantro, eggs, lemon juice, and sour cream to the bowl with the avocado.
Step 3. Mix all the ingredients well until a uniform mixture forms.
description: The classic Mexican guacamole perfect for dipping with Ranchitas Naturales. Fresh, creamy and full of flavor.
